name: Shoot'em'up JIN
description:
Exercice for the "Introduction to Game Programming & Game Engines" course at TélécomSudParis/ENSIIE for the JIN option

Made in 2 days, source code is here: https://github.com/jglrxavpok/SchmupJIN

ZQSD or arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

Tab to change fire mode
